RT @DrTedros: #COVID19 has been a severe disruption to health systems, economies, societies, and to @WHO work to advance towards the ‚Äútripl‚Ä¶
üî¥ LIVE NOW: WHO technical briefing at #EB150 on global #COVID19 situation https://t.co/6WK82mK7NU

"#COVID19 has proven that health is not just a national issue; it‚Äôs an international issue. The scale of challenges we face is immense, & is reflected by the breadth of your agenda this week. The needs are great, & you are right to have great expectations of your WHO"-@DrTedros

@DrTedros "4Ô∏è‚É£th priority is to harness the power of science, research innovation, data & digital technologies as critical enablers for:
-health promotion & disease prevention
-early diagnosis & case management
-prevention, early detection, rapid response to epidemics & pandemics"-@DrTedros

"Such an instrument will be a vital tool, but it will not solve every problem. There are many other steps we must take together to strengthen pandemic preparedness and response, and the architecture to support it"-@DrTedros #EB150 #PandemicAccord

"The decision by Member States at the recent Special Session of the World Health Assembly to negotiate a convention, agreement or other international instrument on pandemic preparedness and response is a giant stride forward"-@DrTedros #EB150 #PandemicAccord

@DrTedros "The 3Ô∏è‚É£rd priority is to urgently strengthen the systems and tools for epidemic and pandemic preparedness and response at all levels, underpinned by strong governance and financing to ignite and sustain those efforts, connected and coordinated globally by WHO"-@DrTedros #EB150
"The #COVID19 pandemic has demonstrated that we must elevate protecting and promoting health as a top priority, with significantly increased investment in countries, and at WHO"-@DrTedros #EB150

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "#COVID19 is a brutal reminder that health is not:
-a by-product of development
-an outcome of prosperous societies
-a footnote of history.
It‚Äôs the ‚ù§Ô∏èbeat; the foundation; the essential ingredient without which no society can flourish"-@DrTedros #EB150

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "The most important of those lessons is the centrality of health. #COVID19 is much more than a pandemic ‚Äì it is a üåç crisis that touches every area of life: economics, education, families, employment, business, technology, trade, travel, tourism, politics, security..."-@DrTedros

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "Ending the acute phase of the #COVID19 pandemic must remain our collective priority. One of the greatest risks now is that we move on to the next crisis and forget the lessons the pandemic has taught us ‚Äì lessons that have come at a great price"-@DrTedros #EB150

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "We used behavioural science to support the pandemic response in üáøüá≤, üá≥üá¨, üá≤üáæ and other health challenges, from nutrition to antimicrobial resistance and maternal health"-@DrTedros #EB150

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "These new initiatives are aligned with many of the recommendations from the various reviews, and provide a solid foundation for strengthening the global health architecture to manage the risks of epidemics and pandemics"-@DrTedros #EB150 https://t.co/AG99GyxZDJ

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "Reflecting longstanding mandates from the World Health Assembly to strengthen pandemic preparedness, we established pathfinding initiatives:
-WHO Hub for Pandemic and Epidemic Intelligence
-WHO BioHub System
-Universal Health and Preparedness Review"-@DrTedros #EB150

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "#COVID19 was far from the only emergency last year. We responded to 76 health emergencies, from acute crises in Afghanistan, DRC, Ethiopia & Tonga to multiple outbreaks of cholera, yellow fever, meningitis, Ebola to protracted emergencies in Syria, Yemen, Cox‚Äôs Bazaar"-@DrTedros

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "Supporting countries to respond to #COVID19 continues to be the focus of our work, at all three levels of the Organization"-@DrTedros #EB150 https://t.co/m03lkWj8NT

@DrTedros @WHOAFRO @WHOEMRO @FCTCofficial "But the #COVID19 pandemic shows we need to be much more ambitious, much better prepared, and improve the way we measure protection against health emergencies"-@DrTedros #EB150 https://t.co/7NxGr1zSQK
